products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Marble White Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their marble white - a contemporary take on a traditional neutral tone. Product id: sdb-pfp0191 fabric colour: marble white material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes mirabella solar crush marble white solar/thermal perfect fit pleated blind in white.
